ground_truth.thought: 推荐一些信用额度使用频率管理工具或服务
ground_truth.name: CreditScore.recommend_tools

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'CreditScore.get_usage_frequency', 'description': 'Get the current credit limit usage frequency and credit score of a user.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'user_id', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the user ID'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'usage_frequency', 'description': 'the credit limit usage frequency'}, {'name': 'credit_score', 'description': 'the credit score of the user'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我想了解如何通过增加信用额度使用频率来改善个人信用记录。首先，获取我当前的信用额度使用频率和信用评分。接着，分析这些频率对信用评分的影响。然后，提供一些增加信用额度使用频率的策略和建议。最后，请推荐一些信用额度使用频率管理工具或服务。
获取我当前的信用额度使用频率和信用评分
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
CreditScore.get_usage_frequency
当前工具的参数'user_id'的值是什么?
user_id
{'usage_frequency': '20%', 'credit_score': '680'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'usage_frequency': '20%', 'credit_score': '680'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
分析这些频率对信用评分的影响
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
CreditScore.analyze_frequency_impact
当前工具的参数'usage_frequency'的值是什么?
{'impact': 'Moderate', 'details': 'A usage frequency of 20% is considered moderate and can have a positive impact on your credit score if managed properly.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'impact': 'Moderate', 'details': 'A usage frequency of 20% is considered moderate and can have a positive impact on your credit score if managed properly.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
提供一些增加信用额度使用频率的策略和建议
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
CreditScore.provide_strategies
当前工具的参数'credit_score'的值是什么?

{'strategies': ['Make small, regular purchases and pay off the balance in full each month.', 'Use your credit card for recurring expenses like utilities or subscriptions.', 'Monitor your spending to ensure you are using your credit limit responsibly.']}

请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
